sentences.sContent: As you lower your pen whilst continuing the motion, you should notice the resulting shape is more regular than it otherwise would have been.
sentences.sContent_eng: As you lower your pen whilst continuing the motion, you should notice the resulting shape is more regular than it otherwise would have been.
sentences.sCn: 随着你降低你的笔，同时保持圆周运动，你应该会注意到画出的形状比起不这样做画出的形状要规范的多。

sentences.sContent: Indeed, it is important to keep fit and healthy, whilst we all aspire to improve the way we look and feel in order to make good first and lasting impressions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, it is important to keep fit and healthy, whilst we all aspire to improve the way we look and feel in order to make good first and lasting impressions.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，为了得到一个良好的初次印象和持续印象，在保持体形和健康的同时，我们也渴望提高自己看待和感受他人的方式。

sentences.sContent: Modules participate in a dynamic life cycle which includes the ability to add, update and remove modules at runtime, whilst preserving the state in the system.
sentences.sContent_eng: Modules participate in a dynamic life cycle which includes the ability to add, update and remove modules at runtime, whilst preserving the state in the system.
sentences.sCn: 模块参与到动态的生命周期里，这个动态的生命周期能够在运行时添加、更新、删除模块，同时保留系统中的状态。
